pages.text: $(li)Sugar is a sweet flavour that can be obtained placing a $(l:patchouli:miscallenous/vanilla/sugar_cane)Sugar Cane$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/autumnity/sap_bottle)Sap Bottle$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/honey_bottle)Honey Bottle$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).

$(li)This item can be used to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/swiftness)Potion of Swiftness$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l).$(br)$(li)Sugar is a valious ingredient for numerous food recipes that can be crafted in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)Sugar allows to you to craft other useful items in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l) too.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:illagers/witch)Witches$(/l) may drop this item on death.
